title: (30800) Lorca - 45 Calle Carril de Caldereros
description: Small parking to visit the City of Lorca.

title: (30800) Lorca - 17 Calle Puerta de San Ginés
title_short: (30800) Lorca - 17 Calle Puerta de San Ginés
description:
Paid parking without service, but central. This is the blue zone. Allows you to pay a maximum of 2h (you must renew it).
Next to the EL TALLER DEL TIEMPO visitor center, which is worth a visit.

title: (30800) Lorca - C. Cta. de Ferrer
description:
Paid motorhome area with water, gray water and black water services and electrical connections.

Restricted access, access only after paying at the cash desk at the barrier

"RULES OF USE OF THE SERVICE AREA

1. Area for the exclusive use of motorhomes, caravans, campers and the like.

2. Parking within the boundaries is allowed, but no camping behavior. For these purposes, items such as tables, chairs, grills, awnings and other similar items of motorhomes are considered camping.

3. Maximum parking time is 48 hours.

4. It is forbidden to make fire in the enclosure or to wash the vehicles.

5. Do not spill liquids outside authorized landfills.

6. Respect other users and neighbors. (especially the neighbors in the buildings next door! They have signs on their balconies against this trailer park. So please stay calm)

7. Help us keep the area clean.

8. Users must comply with all other types of notices that the Town of Lorca requires for the maintenance of the service area.

9. Non-compliance with these rules will be sanctioned.

title: (30800) Lorca - Avenida Europa 58
description: Laundry with 4 washing machines, of different sizes, and 2 dryers

title: (30800) Lorca - 6 Calle Menchiron
description: Parking, you can spend the night

title: (30800) Lorca - 15 Alameda de Cervantes
description: Laundromat

title: (30800) Lorca - Calle Actor Antonio Tudela
description: Very wide and relatively close to the center, seems very quiet

title: (30800) Lorca - 4D Calle Rambla Alta
description: Free dirt parking and ten minutes from downtown. Spacious and quiet place.

title: (30800) Lorca - C. Pilones
description: Castille de Lorca car park, follow these directions to access it. Several spaces suitable for 6 m vans, including a larger one at the back.

title: (30800) Lorca - 52 Diseminado Tiata
description: Large gravel parking, close to the center of Lorca. Upon entering the city, the Municipal Police recommended it to us to visit the city. We did not spend the night but there are no prohibition signs although it is somewhat noisy. No services.

name: BP
title: (30800) BP
description: Laundromat with washing machines directly at the BP petrol station

title: (30800) Lorca - 20 Calle Modistería
description: Land near a subdivision, no services, no parking restrictions, the neighborhood seems quiet, a little far from the city center, the location seems correct to us, but little space in large ruts prevents access to the whole of the place.

title: (30800) Lorca - 87 Carretera de Granada
description: Supermarket with dining area, with microwave, biodegradable cutlery, tables. it is possible to buy food inside and heat it up and consume it in the dining area. spacious and clean bathrooms. free parking

title: (30813) Lorca - km.08 Autovía Lorca-Águilas
description: Fuel station with Autogas/LPG, next to a main road. Good accessibility.

title: (30813) Lorca - 62 Autovía Lorca-Águilas
description: Water tap in the gas station parking lot. Water not drinkable but it's free. There is also fuel and garbage cans.

title: (30813) Lorca - 763 Diseminado Campillo
description: Parque Almenara shopping center parking, no service but Carrefour supermarket and its impeccable wifi, plus the wifi from the shopping center to the parking lot

title: (30813) Lorca - 184 Camino de Vera
description: Autovía A7 salida 636 dirección camino verá 184 .Do you want to rest or relax among a field of olive and orange trees? See the stars outside of light pollution? We are in a large fenced and private area, where you can rest with your motorhome. We have an equipped kitchen (refrigerator, oven, sink...) and a bathroom with sink, shower and washing machine. We have a swimming pool where you can enjoy a relaxing swim and sunbathe, we also have a wood-fired barbecue. We are very close to the shopping center where you can do your shopping, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to receive you

title: (30816) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect and very quiet place to stop to eat. There are picnic tables, a place to have barbecues and if you go up to the church and the viewpoint, you have beautiful views of the valley. We stop to eat because it is 5 minutes from the highway, it is very quiet, it does not have services.

title: (30816) La Hoya - 33 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30816) La Hoya - 33 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description: Simple parking without service. trade nearby restaurant 50M. calm during the day despite the road. very quiet night

title: (30816) La Hoya - 94 N-340a
description: Washing machine. Parking for small van, but there are places in the streets.

title: (30814) Torrealvilla - 91 Diseminado Torrealvilla
description: Drinking water tap in the middle of the village, near the church and the children's playground.

title: (30815) Lorca/Aguaderas - Carretera Malvaloca 174
description: Private parking space on a fenced plot

name: Área el jardín del viajero
title: (30813) Área el jardín del viajero
description: For long periods, decreasing rate. Cozy and family place, there is a Pizzeria restaurant, and a cafeteria / brasserie, There is a large terrace, there is a large playground for children. 15 minutes from the beaches of Aguilas, 30 km from the Pulpi geode. 12 minutes from the center of Lorca, near a gas station and supermarket, 8 minutes from a shopping center.

title: (30815) Lorca - 363 Diseminado Aguaderas
description: Wide esplanade of land next to the hermitage, among olive trees. 13 km from Lorca, and on the road that goes to Campo López. There is little shade. Fairly level ground. We had a very quiet night.

title: (30813) Purias - Camino Guirao 10
description: Here in southern Spain, between the town of Lorca and the port town of Aguilas, there is a small private camper place. A maximum of four campers can be accommodated here. The plot is scrap and the maximum length of the mobile home is 8.50 m. The site is completely fenced. A large well-kept swimming pool is available until the end of October. Next to the pool there is a large pavilion shower (hot/cold) for free use. A fully equipped communal kitchen is available. A service station is available. One adult per night 10 euros, each additional (from 14 years) 5 euros, children 2.50 € (up to 13 years) One dog is free, each additional dog 1.50 € From the 30th day the costs are reduced 20% Electricity is billed individually per kilowatt hour at €0.40, use of the washing machine costs €2.50, WiFi is available in the common area. The property is located on the outskirts of Purias, on the border with Andalusia, with excellent transport links in a quiet rural area. In just 20 minutes by car you are at the sea or in 10 minutes in Lorca. Here you will find everything your heart desires, modern shopping centers, banks, pharmacies, cafes, bars, restaurants and so on. Feel free to contact us by phone, WhatsApp or email

title: (30811) Lorca - 68 Diseminado la Tova
description: Picnic area at the dam with concrete benches and tables. Didn't stand here overnight - but think this shouldn't be a problem.

title: (30815) Campo López -
description: Slightly offset from the road, an area for 2 or 3 vans. View of the mountains (not spectacular anyway). Absolute calm, a few cyclists on the road.

title: (30891) Puerto Lumbreras - Camino los Palomos 218
description: Casa-Lumbreras. Center of many excursions, mountains around, Ideal for cycling, hiking and other activities,

title: (30890) - 3 Calle Holanda
description: In the industrial area at a cheap gas station: hand wash incl. Roof. very good work. I am very pleased. small mobile home = 27.50 euros to large mobile home 8.50 meters = 37.50 euros Opening: 9 a.m. - 2 p.m. and 4 p.m. - 8 p.m. Saturday: 9 a.m. - 2 p.m.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 1 Calle Alemania
description: Low cost gas station with sinks and showers. Open 24 hours. Served by the truck parking staff next door.

title: (30811) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: An absolutely amazing location to spend the night! We stayed a bit higher up, near the road, to have a better view at the beautiful sunset over the lake. Almost no one passing by, birds, bees,... Wish we had more time to stay here!

title: (30850) - 154 Diseminado Lebor Bajo
description: New motorhome area and service area. You can refuel, spend the night, it has toilets (very clean), showers, laundry, children's play area, pet wash, caravan wash and the shop/cafeteria is open 24 hours. If you do not spend the night you also have access to the services but some with a small cost. The girls are very nice.

title: (30859) Nonihay - 18 Diseminado
description:
It is a place that belongs to the town of Aledo, it is worth visiting to see the Strait of Arboleja, a narrowing between two mountains through which a small river flows. The place to spend the night has grills and water. Access is good although it doesn't look like it.
Large vans or motorhomes should not go over the bridge, it is dangerous since it is made to support up to 3500kg and who knows how long it has been made (it is made of wood, not recommended), it is better to park in the parking lot that is before.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 120 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 120 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description:
A new camper place (Nov '22) by Puerto Lumbreras. Right in front of the new Mercadona. Diagonally opposite the Plenoil gas station, cheap fuel! 
The center of the town is within walking distance.  Near the Oficina de Turismo which is opened occasionally.
Passing under the motorway you can go for good walks in the hills.

title: (30811) Lorca -
description: Magnificent spot surrounded by nature and quiet accessible only by 4x4

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 94 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 94 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description: Plenoil gas station.

title: (30850) -
description:
Totana south service station. Wide esplanade. Truck parking. Peaceful place. The noise of the highway is heard, although we have rested well.
Shower in the gas station.

title: (30859) Aledo - 9 Plaza Diputación
description: More or less level ground, very close to the other site and more central there are several bars and a supermarket nearby.

title: (30859) Aledo - 27 Avenida Sierra Espuña
description: Parking at the entrance of the town, one of the few places to park a motorhome given the characteristics of the town on a hill with very narrow streets

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 40 Calle Mayor
description:
3 washing machine 12kg
2 washing machine 16kg
4 dryers

name: Camping Totana
title: (30850) Camping Totana
description: , 27 Lugar Lebor Alto

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 11 Calle Tejera
description: Large car park above the city, quiet and far from festive places. No service but good for a quiet night as long as you can sleep with the noise of the two highways which are both very close.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 3 Calle Tejera
description: Parking in Castillo Nogalte Puerto Lumbreras. Cafeteria Restaurant open from 8:00 pm and interesting surroundings to visit

title: (30859) Totana - C-7
description: Beautiful picnic area on the small road that leads to the statue of Jesus. Many possibilities of barbecue and places to sit. Parking only at designated locations, but there is no prohibition! There are two parking spaces, one about 50 meters after the roundabout and the other a little higher. Great place. One could use the toilets from the next location (parking), near the church, walk maybe 5 minutes.

title: (30859) Totana - RM-502
description: The Sanctuary of Santa Eulalia in Totana, Sierra de Espuña, was one of our discoveries in our first AC experience. Precise place, quiet and secluded. There is a bar that closes at night and a huge parking lot and toilets. It is worth the visit to the sanctuary and sleep in silence among pines is priceless

title: (30859) Totana -
description: Parking at Mirador del Corazón de Jesús. Beautiful view. 1 or 2 fairly flat places, others strongly inclined.

title: (30859) Totana - RM-502
description: Picnic area near the sanctuary has barbecues, toilets and drinking water source. No flat surface to sleep. Not very big and might be busy during weekends. Good to make manual service of waters but overnight stay better at sanctuary parking.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - Unnamed Road
description: Huge car park behind the omnisports hall, tarred or not, as you wish.

title: (30859) Sierra Espuña -
description: Leisure area "Las Alquerías".

name: Apartamento Rico's
title: (30893) Apartamento Rico's
description:
Villa Almendricos is a lovely safe quiet place with superb 360 degree views of the nearby mountains and surrounded by nature. Tarmac access all the way apart from the last 100 metres which is by firm track. Only 15 minutes from the A7 Autovia Del Mediterraneo at Puerto Lumbreras on quiet scenic roads.

This is an ideal place to spend a night or two, or longer with great views, both sunrise and sunset and clear starry nights. Water and electricity included, plus black waste disposal and or use of onsite toilet plus washing machine available (extra charge) Also available fully equipped self contained holiday rental apartment "Rico's Retreat" on site, available to book through AirBnB etc. great if you want stay or have visiting family or friends.

Adult Only Swimming pool and outside shower only available if not being used by holiday rental guests. Great area for walking or cycling or just sitting back and relaxing.

Please note that this is a small rustic camping and currently we only have marked space for three motorhomes so please make contact before arriving, although we do have extra room, thank you.

title: (30850) Diputación de Mortí - 389 Lugar Morti Alto
title_short: (30850) Diputación de Mortí - 389 Lugar Morti Alto
description: CAMPERSTOP SIERRA ESPUÑA. TOTANA. This stop over is featured in All the Aires (84). It has one shower which is clean, 5 minutes use, pay via a box on wall. The owner is very friendly and lives next door. Excellent stop for mountain biking and walking.

title: (30890) Lorca - 96 Paraje Zarzalico
description: Parking by the road, but not very noisy, with a beautiful view

title: (30814) Zarzadilla de Totana -
description: A nice place for a picnic or a night out, right next to a road with little traffic. A rascal who thinks of something other than a signpost here

title: (30890) Henares -
description: Site very close to the highway, but very quiet, beautiful sunset

title: (30890) Lorca - 127 Paraje Zarzalico
description: Parking Henares Cemetery.  Flat. Overlooks the village and the surrounding fruit plantations. No shadow. Very calm. OK for a night stop. With a clean toilet, that’s actually open.

title: (30890) Lorca - 93 A-91
description: To spend the night or stop on the way to Granada ... next to the motorway ... large parking lot with table and trees (garbage and a little dirty place) ... little traveled, we were the only ones and had a very quiet night although the highway is heard a little ...

name: Casa Los Lobos
title: (30893) Casa Los Lobos
description: Great welcome near Lorca. We parked within their property which has been fitted out to accommodate vans and motorhomes. Kevin and Mimi are very nice and very helpful. Swimming pool, impeccable sanitary facilities, kitchen area, even a television area. The owners even offer meals or drinks. Belgian beer lovers will be delighted, we had a very relaxing and refreshing stopover.

title: (30814) Zarzadilla de Totana - 8 Travesía San Isidro 4
title_short: (30814) Zarzadilla de Totana - 8 Travesía San Isidro 4
description: Quiet place where you can spend the night in the district of Zarzadilla de Totana, equipped with barbecues, tables, water. Ideal place for hiking or mountain biking since there are many routes in the area, also in the town you can find a pharmacy, bakery, grocery store, highly recommended at the BAR, where you can enjoy good food or have some good beers.

title: (30876) Lorca - 23 N-332
description: Good lunch or overnight stop on what was the old road before a new bridge and road section built. Incredibly beautiful views, road doesn't carry much traffic so no noise problem.

name: A-Seven Totana Camperstop
title: (30850) A-Seven Totana Camperstop
description: A-Seven Totana Camperstop

title: (30850) Totana - 2 Calle Ojo Peralta
description: Huge parking lot (can accommodate more than 500 trucks). Great to spend the night if you are passing through or have to work on your camper as there is an adjacent industrial area. The ground is gravel. If you are all the way in the back you hear almost no traffic.

title: (30876) Lorca - 110 Lugar Ramonete
description: Quiet parking lot among the ruins.

title: (30893) Almendricos - 18 Avenida del Muelle
description:
Starting point of the Via Verde Almendricos-Guadix.
Very quiet place with boards, benches and trashes bins.

title: (30876) Lorca - 47 Lugar Ramonete
description: Water tap. Not threaded so you will need a container

title: (30876) Lorca - 16 N-332-2
description: Repsol service station.

name: Camping La Quinta Bella (Flordevida)
title: (30880) Camping La Quinta Bella (Flordevida)
description: Quiet campsite in the middle of the hills. The plots are larger than elsewhere, you can park your car and caravan on your own. The staff and residents will welcome you warmly and will be happy to provide you with information. When the bar is open (Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays from 1 to 4 p.m. and Saturdays from 7 p.m.), the chef's creative cuisine is a must-see as well as the desserts of Terry, the owner. If you feel like it, you can join the dance, tai chi and painting classes. The walks with your dogs start from the site itself and take you to the mandarin orchards. About ten kilometers from magnificent beaches and the typically Spanish town of Águilas, calm is assured.

title: (30848) Murcia - 9 Diseminado Sierra Espuña
description: Parking located next to a recreation area in the Sierra de Espuña Natural Park, with picnic area, and the starting point for many hiking trails, it is quite level.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area with public fountain. Gas station. Gray and black cast iron. Water filling in the coin column. Washing for motorhomes. Burger King restaurant. Restaurant cafeteria. Large car park. South orientation.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Access to water, but probably no drinking water. Petrol station (Repsol), motorway restaurant and playground

title: (30810) Zarcilla de Ramos - Unnamed Road
description: Small bulge at the edge of a small road. In the morning a couple of trucks drive by otherwise it's almost deserted. Had a very quiet night with a beautiful view.

title: (30812) Avilés - 1 Calle Avilés 09
description: There are several camping tables, there is also a park for children and a water fountain, although the fountain states that the water is not drinkable, the truth is that it is, I was born and raised in that town and we always drink that water, the artist is because the water is not treated the area also has large areas is flat

title: (30889) Águilas - 13 Lugar el Garrobillo
description: Drinking water fountain with threaded connection

title: (30876) Los Curas -
description: Great place in the middle of nowhere to rest and enjoy nature. On a road that seems to have very little traffic. No services! No prohibition signs!

title: (04691) Huércal-Overa - AL-9107
description: Pleasant and shaded area for a break, gas and restaurant in front

title: (30876) Mazarrón -
description: Thought I'd arrive somewhere else! Since Google sent me wrong on an unpaved path, I ended up in a nice place! (I came with a crafter bus, it was certainly doable but just take it easy) Fire without problems;) live life everyone

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Carretera Fuente Alta
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Carretera Fuente Alta
description: Viewpoint of the Sierra Espuña over the Alhama valley of Murcia. Forbidden to stay the night

title: (30876) Lorca - RM-D20
description: Breathtaking place. very windy. but the panorama repays everything when you wake up in the morning. parking behind the antenna. lost in nothingness

title: (30800) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Parking space on the road from Zarcilla de ramos to the reservoir val de infierno. A bit off the road. Start of the hike to Pericay.

title: (30876) Los Curas -
description: On the side of the road but incredible view! Very little traffic.

title: (30177) Casas Nuevas -
description: New area in new houses. It has space for about 20 RVs and is behind the small town. Nearby is the Casas Nuevas hostel, which has a cafeteria and restaurant service. The neighborhood is very clean and the surroundings are really beautiful, on the slopes of the Sierra Espuña. 48 hours max. Illuminate a little less at night, it's like being under floodlights

title: (30876) Lorca - 402 Lugar Ramonete
description: Pitch Villa Brisa. One of the oldest pitches in Spain. Over 20 years. There are pitches for about 30-35 mobile homes, disposal, water, shower.

name: Camping Sierra Espuña
title: (30848) Camping Sierra Espuña
description: A great small well equipped campsite. lovely walks. great helpful staff. take acsi card.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 3 Calle México
description: Finally a self-service laundry where it is easy to park, even for big motorhomes. The laundry chain is one of the cheapest and very efficient. Prices on photos.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 121A Avenida Gines Campos
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 121A Avenida Gines Campos
description: Large car park at the entrance coming from Totana, visit the castle. bathrooms of the archaeological museum ... It is close to the Mercadona shopping center, next door, and the Café el Circulo.

title: (30848) El Berro -
description: Quiet place, surrounded by forest, near the road and with good access by dirt track.

title: (30876) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Lonely parking space directly on the sea. No supply and disposal. Space can be reached via a gravel road. The last 20 meters are a bit narrower. It still lapped with our VW Bulli without 4x4. Worthwhile for those who prefer peace and absolute solitude.

title: (30876) Lorca - 27 Diseminado Garrobillo
description: Only for off-road vehicles. On a fantastic beach

title: (30876) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Couple of level spots at the stone beach. No shade, no services

title: (30876) Lorca - 28 Diseminado Garrobillo
description: One of the many possible places along the coast to Cap Cope very popular in winter by northern Europeans who are permanently installed with large buses. Coastal track also accessible by van. A treat for mountain biking.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Rambla Don Diego (Recinto Ferial)
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Rambla Don Diego (Recinto Ferial)
description: Great parking in the center of town. Accessible to large motorhomes. Asphalted and flat. No problem to spend the night. During the day there is a lot of traffic but without disturbing. In the quiet night. Close to shops, restaurants and services. Public toilets very close, on the ground floor of the town hall square. Tuesday is market day, do not park, Monday do not spend the night. During the local festivities it is occupied as a Fairground.

title: (30876) Lorca -
description: Place in the heart of the wilderness ideal for listening to birdsong Accessible to vans and motorhomes maximum 6 meters Avoid in case of rain

title: (30870) Mazarrón - Calle Helecho
description:
Great place in the middle of nature with hot springs. Small pools in different temperatures, protected between bushes. Nice to walk along a varied riverbed.
Access a bit difficult. Parallel to the highway is a very bumpy path. Deep potholes. Can you usually drive around.

title: (30870) - Autopista AP-7, Km 848
description: Gas station with easily accessible free water tap.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - Calle Helecho
description: Secluded place at the edge of the forest near the hot springs. Those who do not drive away directly by car (offroad) or come at night can park here. Small threshold to overcome. Sources in the direction of travel left hand. Oriented on the golf course. about 15 minutes walk.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 1 Calle Ermita Padre Manuel
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 1 Calle Ermita Padre Manuel
description: I spent the night in Alhama before going up to Sierra Espuña and I found this place open to the ferias ... it has no services of any kind but I have slept calmly and without discomfort. It is very close to the center of town and you can see its castle which I think you can walk up.

title: (30876) Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Small beautiful bay with your feet in the water. forbidden to stay overnight. Steep access.

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego - 267 Diseminado Ifre
description: BP petrol station where you can empty gray and black water for free and fill 15 liters of clean water with 0.50 euro coins. Gas bottle exchange.

title: (30889) Águilas - 3 Lugar el Labradorcico
description: Laundromat at BP TRUCKS STOPS station.

title: (30875) Murcia -
description: A bit of waste ground, would be ok for a night or 2. There are bars, shops and restaurants. Room for about 200 campers. No facilities but you can use the bars and restaurants if you eat and drink there. I even asked if i coud top up with there water and no problem.

title: (30849) Alhama de Murcia - RM-E24
description: C'est un lieu en pleine nature bien tranquille pour une nuit

title: (30840) Murcia - 1 Diseminado Sierra Muela
description: Area to spend, near the viewpoint of the mill.

title: (04691) Úrcal -
description:
Parking for 3 units in grounds of private residential property. Follow gps to keep on road until 400m of track. Phone for availability prior to arrival. Secure, Showers, Toilets, Limited Electric possible, Outside sitting area with open fire, No lights other than starlight but solar lights available, €8 per night.
WhatsApp for accurate location and directions.

name: Camperpark
title: (30880) Camperpark
description: Dümo Camperpark Aguilas, the site was taken over and renovated by Dümo on 9/1/22. The owner is a German company, the employees here are multilingual, Spanish, French, English, German. The space is very spacious and also offers space for liners. Bar with small gastronomy and baguette service. Many recreational opportunities, private pool, boules court, bike paths, hiking. Shops and Aguilas about 3 km. To the sea about 2 km. Beautiful location on the hill with great views and very quiet.

title: (30876) Lorca - RM-D21
description: Small private camperstop. Parking on gravel, room for 14 vans. 1km walk to the village of Puntas de Calnegre with its beach a couple of bar restaurants and a shop. Services included in price, Grey and Black emptying and Potable water no electric.

title: (30876) Águilas - Unnamed Road
description: Beach parking lot. Difficult access by very steep track. Possible to go to the creek before (easier) or after even steeper. Discovered during the Aguilas Mazarron mountain bike crossing.

title: (30880) Águilas - 1 Camino del Cementerio
description: Camino del Cementerio, Aguilas

title: (30880) Águilas - Carr. de Lorca
description: German gas bottles can be exchanged or refilled here.

title: (30889) Águilas - 7 Calle 6
description: Large petrol station with lavomatic. several machines drying. also washing area vehicles and pressure. big and very clean

title: (30889) Aguilas -
description: Good place in peace and far from urban beaches and so much mobility of people.

title: (30880) Águilas - 36 Calle Doctor Luis Prieto
description: Cheap gas and free water. You can even hit the windshield...

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 3 Autovía Totana - Mazarrón
description: A supermarket to buy everything you need (consumer franchise), very friendly and great service.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Space for 2 motorhomes on reservoir access road. No services, lots of walks and bike trails quiet and peaceful. Please respect the area.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 3 Autovía Totana - Mazarrón
description: Repsol garage. Parking spaces with electric hook up, water supply and waste point within the Repsol garage just off the main road. Huge entrance and turning, no height restrictions. Gravel standing, looks quite new (as at 2018).

title: (30848) Gebas -
description: Beautiful place with nice view of the canyons (Bardenas type) location for 3 vehicles. Access recommended in 4 * 4, height 2m35

title: (30880) Águilas - 23 Calle Murcia
description: Plot of land within Águilas, spacious and quiet for parking, with a slight unevenness. I spent 3 nights during the carnivals and without problems, or any noise, 15min walk from the center.

title: (30876) Puntas de Calnegre - RM-D21
description: Very good place to spend the night, 3 to 4 seats. Very good bathing area, and you can go fishing for a while at night. There is a container nearby to throw away the garbage, and there is neither filling nor emptying of water. For everything else, a quiet area to spend a good weekend with beach bars very close.

name: TARRAY CAMPER PARK
title: (30876) TARRAY CAMPER PARK
description: Parking space with V/E, no electricity but water supply and black & grey disposal. Next to the beach with great views. Easy access for any size of motorhome.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 71A Avenida de Antonio Fuertes
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 71A Avenida de Antonio Fuertes
description: For a stopover not far from the highway. large, slightly sloping car park next to the information point and a few flatter car spaces between this car park and what we believe to be a crematorium. near the cemetery. we had a quiet night. background noise (motorway? air conditioning motors?) not bothersome. in our opinion only for a stage without any unpacking and remaining discreet.

title: (30889) Águilas - RM-D15
description: Easy parking next to the coastal road on the beach. Sea view, 1.5 km to a supermarket and bakery. Garbage disposal in the village, 500 m. Do not park on the sea side, it is forbidden. Good, wide access. No overnight.

title: (30876) Lorca - 414 Calle Ramonete Litoral
description: Spacious and quiet place next to a beach full of fishermen. In season many motorhomes and vans with music.

title: (30889) Calabardina - 19 Calle Vicente Aleixandre
description: Mixed tarmac parking accessible to any size motorhome 150 meters from the beach Trash cans Night lighting Quiet residential area

title: (30889) Águilas - 38 RM-D15
description: Mora Turtle Beach RV Park. Camper place directly on the beach. Quiet area surrounded by fields. Chiringuito, good food, unbeatable location on the beach. Bread is available from 10:30 a.m. at reception. Supermarket and shops 2.5 km

title: (30880) Águilas - 2 Calle H
description: We didn't like the Herillo car park, too many vehicles passing through. We slept here with another German motorhome. We were not disturbed.

title: (30880) Águilas - 38 Calle de Juan Ramon Jimenez
title_short: (30880) Águilas - 38 Calle de Juan Ramon Jimenez
description: Very tranquil street spot near the high chimney, with nice views, including the castle. I really enjoyed this place. Much better than the nearby approach road to Mercadona where campers often park. Spent several days and nights here with no issues. If you go south straight to the beach (about 700m?) you will find good water taps (foot showers, so take a funnel).

title: (30876) Lorca - 29 Lugar Ramonete
description: Parking right by the beach, nice restaurant and fishing. The hole area has a lot of good parking

title: (30889) Calabardina - 2 Calle Canalicas
description: Public parking on the beach.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent view. Not to difficult to access. Isolated but not far from asfalted road.

title: (30880) Águilas - Calle C-M Ua Nº1
description: Free parking fenced and night lighting, RV authorized

title: (30812) Coy - 76 Calle Cureta
description: Artificial beach of Coy, free pinewood parking with barbecues and wooden tables anchored to the ground and a very pretty village where you can make hiking and mountain biking routes that begin at the entrance of the town next to the hostel

title: (30880) Murcia - C. Azorin
description: Mixed car park 150 meters from the beach, quiet area, good for one night, accessible to any size of motorhome in the off season Garbage cans

title: (30880) Águilas - 35 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Laundromat. 3 washing machines of 8kg 5th, 3 maxi at 8th and 3 dryers at 3rd per half hour. clean and functional. open 8am-10pm be careful parking is not easy in Aguilas, we came by bike.

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego -
description: Obviously they have renamed themselves to not make negative comments accessible. However, the dubious but and disposal remained, as did the legal dispute.

title: (30889) Calabardina - 2 Calle la Dorada
description: Large parking space close to the sea. Quiet at night.

title: (30848) - 4 Diseminado Flotas Calceta
description: Private family parking water, electricity, service garage with tools for small and medium reoarations. Hiking advice climbing caving and beaches. Traditional food can be shared in a Spanish family environment. cultural exchange donations and share expenses.very nice family parking, donations are accepted, garage with tools water electricity possible to make fire and share experience with Spanish family traditional food trekking climbing have general information.allowed animals. Possible music cinema ect.pool.sauna ... possible to make fire outside and inside the house.

title: (30889) Calabardina - 12 Calle Golondrina
description: Perfect for an overnight stay. very quiet high-end residential area. flat ground and garbage nearby.

title: (30880) Águilas - 1 Calle B
description: Parking for several dozen cars next to the shopping center where you can use the toilet. About two minutes to walk to the beach. Quiet and peaceful at night.

title: (30880) Águilas - 13 Avenida del Hornillo
description: Small parking lot on the beach at the mosaic steps of Hornillo. Nearby is a very large P place for possible. larger motorhomes. No amenities. But out of season I don't foresee any problems staying overnight.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - 18 Lugar Gebas
description: Parking near Gebas and the Mirador du Barrancos in Gebas, valid for the day and for the night, with a fountain. Many hikes with interesting mountain scenery from this point.

title: (30880) Águilas - 210L Calle Goleta
description: Parking for the day. Next to the beach and a short walk from town.  No restrictions   Gets busy with locals visiting the beach.  Not recommend if it is rainy weather

title: (30889) Águilas - 22 Calle Musico Sebastian Zaragoza
description: Parking along the public road near Mercadona. No facilities.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Av. de Antonio Fuertes
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Av. de Antonio Fuertes
description: Relatively steep and narrow gravel road, but managable with a regular van. The view is amazing, but it was very dirty when we arrived. Space for 2/3 vans. We cleaned up as much as possible and spent a very quiet night.

title: (30880) Águilas - s/n Calle Explanada del Muelle
title_short: (30880) Águilas - s/n Calle Explanada del Muelle
description: Quiet parking with beautiful views

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - 232 RM-515
description: Parking next to a restaurant, spectacular place, quiet area for sleeping.

title: (30880) Águilas - 35 Calle A
description: The right side of the street that goes down to the yellow beach is full of parking, it is on a steep slope

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego -
description: ("Ziegenwiese") Free parking spaces on hard sand on the beach. Surrounded by mountains and with bike paths to Mazarrón. Dog friendly beach. Containers provided but no other services. Access via orchards with winding roads, but with caution. Very stony and bumpy driveway to the beach. Large Concorde 6 wheeler parked so access is good but bumpy. The BP garage in Mazarrón offers gray waste and fresh water for a small fee. nice place.

title: (30876) Mazarrón - Carretera Percheles
description:
Many places, facing the sea and in the countryside, really very nice and quiet. No problem even for very big templates.
Some places are shade, others under open sun, all in front of a dog friendly beach, no problem to camp even for a few days.

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego -
description: A great site with your feet in the water! Attention the path is passable in CC but 4x4 essential on the sand.

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area by the beach. Lots of places occupied by many motorhomes come to spend the winter here. After their resorts continue to our indicated point.

title: (30880) Águilas - 8 Calle Explanada del Muelle
description: We spent a Friday night and the music from the restaurant that is 50 meters away bothered us until 3 in the morning. We decided not to repeat on Saturday night since the music started again at about 5:00 p.m. Being Saturday, the parking lot was filled with cars and getting out was difficult. Midweek in low season is recommended.

title: (30880) Águilas - 31 Calle Puerto de Poniente
description: Parking by the sea at the end of a dead end, near a pier and at the foot of the cliff. No service

title: (30876) Mazarrón - Calle Antonio Saura
description: Wild place. We sleep well.

title: (04648) Jaravia-Pulip - C.Liano 39-41
description: About 14 parking spaces, 1 WC, 1 shower, water/no drinking water!! Supply/disposal, 1 washing machine, free wifi (partially on site), etc. The owner speaks several languages. Electricity. until 30.4. , from May to August, please register in advance and ask

title: (30889) Águilas - 26 Diseminado Cope
description: Quiet place, very close to the road, the sea is also very close. It does not have a sandy beach. Lots of flies.

title: (30876) Mazarrón - Calle Antonio Saura
description: Very long beach of stones and rocks without any service. You can stay overnight. Leave it better that you found it so that it is conserved and we can enjoy it.

title: (30889) Águilas - 29 Lugar Matalentisco
description: Quiet place to park. No service. Close to the beach, bars and restaurants.

title: (30889) Águilas - 19 Calle Abenarabi
description: Pitch with sea view

title: (30889) Águilas - 34 Lugar Matalentisco
description: Not indicated on the map, we followed the parking for the marina nearby, but we wanted free parking. This is not the best area as there is parking near a beach, but as long as you slow down, this is an ideal place to stay. A restaurant / bar is just a short walk away and if you keep walking along the beach, you will reach the Castle-Castillo de San Juan. Which is closed until March 31 (I think). It is quite popular with walkers and runners and is close enough to the road. We do not have dogs, but we have seen tons of dogs in the area, so dogs are welcome.

title: (30876) Mazarrón - Calle Antonio Saura
description: Place of relaxation, without hurry, just relax.

name: Camping & Bungalows Bellavista
title: (30889) Camping & Bungalows Bellavista
description: Place is neat and clean. The pool is nice but only open from 11. Well located to get to the beach. Reception rather unfriendly in the evening, friendly in the morning. Pricing confusing we were only told when we left that our child (2 years) would also cost. Children are billed from 1 - in my opinion very expensive for a small child. Pitches are quite spacious and shaded with a tarpaulin - even on rainy days the heat builds up here until late in the nice ans ckean

title: (30876) Mazarrón - Avenida Pedro López Meca
description: Small plain at the foot of the beach, along a path that borders the entire coastline where you will find a multitude of mobile homes on the way

title: (30889) Águilas - 54 RM-333
description: Service area without parking, at the Annibal service station, next to the area of the same name. Very kind. Ask for the key at the station. Here, you can request the filling of your gas cylinders (except Spanish cylinder) with LPG.

name: Camper Area Aníbal
title: (30889) Camper Area Aníbal
description: Camper Area Aníbal. Anibal gas station near Aguilas has been transformed. Small bar and 3 pétanque tracks. Timed token shower, emptying and filling included in daily rate. Wi-Fi included. not very well placed and a bit noisy during the day but everything is very clean.

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego -
description: Small sandy esplanade for 4/6 motorhomes, on the beach, without services. Nudist coves area, very quiet. The accesses are dirt and stone roads more or less traveled. Recommended 4x4 in sandy areas.

title: (30889) Calarreona -
description:
Parking directly on the beach, access authorized up to 5.5 meters.
Bins available, directly on the sandy beach

title: (04640) Pulpí - Poligono S-AG2A, 33
description: Parking to visit the Pulpi Geode

title: (30870) Mazarrón -
description: Beautiful abandoned mineral mine, landscape like on Mars. Uphill gravel road. We drove in without a 4x4. It may be too narrow for large motorhomes. There are two large flat squares between the buildings on site. During the day a lot of walkers, at night we were alone.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia -
description: Parking Mirador Barrancos De Gebas (name error on Google map), access by rocky road, OK for all vehicles. Nice view. No off-season services, a water fountain from the point of view, not functional during our visit

title: (30870) Mazarrón -
description: Secluded location in ruins near an old mine

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - 460 Calle Alondra
description: Open area with some trees, and toilets with water.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 2 Calle Santa Lucia
description: In front of the Mazarrón mines, no prohibition signs, we spent a quiet night there. A little noise at the level of the road below but not very disturbing. Ideal for visiting the mines. Several spaces in the parking lot below. We went there with a 7 meter motorhome. Possibility to turn around. No services

title: (04691) Almería - A-7
description:
Cepsa station
Truck and vehicle parking
Just ask at the station reception or at least let them know that we are going to sleep.
To fill up with water, ask at reception and you will be given the tap handle
Shop with the possibility of using the microwave
Restaurant (currently closed)
Peaceful place
Pleasant and smiling seller

title: (30889) Calarreona -
description: Parking at the bottom of a really quiet dirt road for motorhomes up to 7 meters at the edge of the cliff

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - A-350
description: Parking near the road. Possible most certainly for the night because no prohibition. Accessible to large riders like us (bus). Do not hesitate to go to the restaurant opposite (La Cruce) .

title: (30889) Águilas - RM-333
description: A beautiful wild beach. No services. It says that the length limit is 5.2 meters but in winter it is full of motorhomes over 5.2 m.

title: (04820) Vélez-Rubio - 23 Calle Paco El Cuarta
description: There is no signage and we were not charged. It is in a massive car park and there is fresh water and grey and black waste disposal. The area behind the pavilion bowls. During the summer fiestas, that take place in the first days of August can be difficult to stay in the area, noise and can be taken by the market.  Just a reminder there is no signage for the Aire but it is there and has the facilities mentioned.

title: () San Juan De Los Terreros -
description:
Spanish ruin illegally occupied by people
All welcome
Best regards

title: (04820) Vélez-Rubio - 3 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Parking near the town center and the church. Convenient to visit.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: El Mirador del Embalse de Algeciras. Parking place (3 places) with panoramic view of the water basin. Very calm. Only 2 cars passed during the entire afternoon. Beautiful views.

title: (30889) Calarreona - Cam. Playa de la Carolina
title_short: (30889) Calarreona - Cam. Playa de la Carolina
description: Nice parking lot with access to two spectacular coves. There are garbage cans. Length limit: 5.2 meters. Please don't take out tables or awnings!!

title: (30889) Calarreona - Cam Playa de los Cocedores
title_short: (30889) Calarreona - Cam Playa de los Cocedores
description: Good place! The place is beautiful! The police come regularly to check if everything is ok, but nothing more. Because the space for mobile homes is actually over 5.2mtr. Length forbidden, the sign is right at the entrance to the square! The baker comes around 8-8:30 to sell her bread.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 6 Avenida de las Moreras
description: Raspa Oil LPG and Fuel.

title: (04648) San Juan De Los Terreros - Unnamed Road
title_short: (04648) San Juan De Los Terreros - Unnamed Road
description: Along the coast without any services

title: (04820) Vélez-Rubio - 3 Poligono Unidad e 34 y 6
description: Medium esplanade next to the town's municipal pool, luxury complex, 4 pools, 1 Olympic and the others will delight young and old, as they have slides of all sizes, good shade and a restaurant, perfect for summer. The access is a little narrow but it passes well. greetings

title: (04648) Almeria - 44M Diseminado el Cocon
description: Large parking lot despite some ruts. The police just passed by. Cradled by the waves.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 3 Calle Salvador Dalí
description: Launderette with parking.

name: Natur-Stellplatz Villa Tudela
title: (30879) Natur-Stellplatz Villa Tudela
description: Nature parking space Villa Tudela. Separated area for campers who are looking for peace and nature on the area of a finca. Great view of almond, fig and olive trees and the surrounding mountains. Observe wild rabbits, red partridge and sometimes eagles. Camping behavior expressly desired. “You should be able to enjoy camping on our pitch and have enough space.” After the harvest, organically grown, cold-pressed olive oil can be purchased from the nearby farmer. Swiss owners look forward to your visit (language: German, French, English). Voluntary fee for the maintenance and care of the parking spaces. Please inquire in advance by phone or Whatsapp. If possible, send a photo of your caravan so that we can clarify whether a suitable place is free for you. Open October to March. Visits outside the opening times are possible, but only by prior arrangement.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 132 Diseminado Rincones
description: Cheap diesel, at transport company. only between 7 am and 10 pm

title: (04648) Pulpí - 3P Lugar Urbanizacion Puerto Chrommelynck
description: Parking in a dead end street. The trip to the top is without problems. There is parking left and right. Very quiet, in the evening or in the morning locals come walking their dogs.

name: "El Moreral" Área de Autocaravanas.
title: (30877) "El Moreral" Área de Autocaravanas.
description: Newly opened area with many services and ample parking, located in an emblematic place with a beach 5 minutes away, and in the middle of the mountain. Quiet, natural area with a Gas Station, Supermarket, Town and Port very close to our town.

title: (30176) Sangrador de las Anguilas - Unnamed Road
title_short: (30176) Sangrador de las Anguilas - Unnamed Road
description: Parking where to leave the vehicles. From there you begin to climb to the archaeological site of Almoloya.

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 131 Urbanizacion Punta Vela
description: Several quiet spots around this loop rather suitable for 4x4, but maybe it is tried with a larger vehicle

name: Camping "Pinar del rey"
title: (04830) Camping "Pinar del rey"
description: Camping "Pinar del Rey". Between the pines of beautiful places in the Sierra de los Vélez. Beautiful castle.

title: (30848) Los Zancarrones -
description: Pitch in the void overlooking the lake, the landscape is spectacular, a pity that the road to get there is quite bumpy so a 4x4 is recommended.

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 184D Urbanizacion Punta Vela
description: At the start of the hiking and cycling trails through the mountains. Easy access and next to the beach. A beautiful spot close to nature. Very quiet.

title: (04647) Los Jurados - Unnamed Road
description: Diner without more history. A total of four tables, with views of the mountains on one side and the sea on the other. worth to eat

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 5 Calle Júpiter
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 5 Calle Júpiter
description: Huge quiet and calm mixed car park Asphalt unbuilt residential place next to a wooded park beach 200 meters away

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 41T Poligono S-RTU4
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 41T Poligono S-RTU4
description: Large area with small bushes, lots of space and easily accessible. Street to see and hear, no sea view - unless you have a 4x4. A pretty steppe setting. No trash can on site. They are available nearby, there are also supermarkets, bars etc. ATTENTION ⚠️ Do not leave shoes in front of the motorhome at night. Little white dog? catch her and kidnap her??

title: (04648) Almeria - 10 Calle Columbia
description: large car park

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 101 Urbanizacion Punta Vela
description:
Parking space in residential area. 
max 4 small/medium camper pitches

title: (04830) Vélez-Blanco -
description: Parking air at the exit of the city. Flat terrain. Very nice view of the pretty village of Vèlez Blanco. Quietly we spent one night there.
